title: Turn Your House Into a Sewer
itunes:title: Turn Your House Into a Sewer
description:
This week we weigh in on such games as Immortality, The Last of Us Part I on PS5, TMNT: The Cowabunga Collection, Tinykin, and Madden 23, discuss getting stoned at family gatherings, dig into news like the PS5 price hike, the playable PSVR2 at TGS, Sony and Tencent's investment in From Software, Denuvo on the Switch, and more!

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

(00:00:00) NOTE: Some timecodes may be inaccurate for versions other than the ad-free Patreon version due to dynamic ad insertions. Please use caution if skipping around to avoid spoilers. Thanks for listening.
(00:00:10) Intro
(00:01:29) Will summer ever end?!
(00:03:20) Doing some car camping
(00:03:56) The booze factor at camping or a party
(00:08:02) Kids taking a sip of that beer
(00:09:01) Where is the pot smoking happening at family events?
(00:13:15) Show Rundown
(00:14:17) This week's Watchcast
(00:16:08) The Games
(00:16:11) Immortality [PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox Series X|S] on Aug 30, 2022
(00:44:05) First Break
(00:44:18) The Last of Us Part I [PlayStation 5] on Sep 02, 2022
(00:56:53) Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Cowabunga Collection [Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4] on Aug 30, 2022
(01:05:57) Tinykin [Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One] on Aug 30, 2022
(01:08:57) Madden NFL 23 [PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Aug 19, 2022
(01:12:35) Cult of the Lamb [Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Aug 11, 2022
(01:13:24) Elden Ring [PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5] on Feb 25, 2022
(01:16:01) Second Break
(01:16:06) The news
(01:16:30) PS5 price increase
(01:23:14) PlayStation VR2 at TGS
(01:27:28) NetEase acquires Quantic Dream
(01:29:38) Sony and Tencent acquire portions of FromSoftware
(01:36:40) Denuvo coming to Switch games?
(01:42:07) Emails
(01:47:51) Wrapping up and thanks
(01:49:39) Mysterious Benefactor Tier Shoutouts
(01:51:42) Nextlander content updates
(01:53:40) See ya!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
